source.name: Monsters of Feyland 1
source.author: Andrew Cawood
source.description:
Cawood Publishing presents Monsters of Feyland for 5th Edition! (Now includes conversion tables for OSE, DCC, PF1, and PF2) 100 new monsters and lore about the land of the Fey. From the Doubt Trout to the Witch King, this is a unique collection. Featuring the incredible art of Travis Hanson.
Just around the corner... Beyond the stone gate... Through the mirror... Lies Feyland!
This 112-page book includes:
• Game Master advice about Feyland • Seelie and Unseelie Courts • 100 new 5E monsters with individual illustrations, stat blocks, and bios • Fey, dragons, giants, undead, lycanthropes, beasts, and more • CRs 1/8 to 25 • Encounter table for Feyland • Fey flora
